title: Great community for great people! Visit today!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at Ashland Pines, located at 1247 Adcox Road Stone Mountain, GA 30088.', 'Description', '........', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments offer exceptional features.', 'Residents enjoy wood burning stone fireplaces, full size washers and dryer connections, and spacious floor plans with bay windows that allow abundant natural light.', "Half off first month's rent!", 'Bedrooms', '........... 2', 'Bathrooms', '......... 2', 'Sq Footage', '......... 1134 sq ft', 'Unit Price', '........... $1655/Month', 'Lease Term', '........ 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Amenity List', '......', '− BBQ/Picnic Area', '− Conference Room', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Grill', '− Maintenance/Manager on site', '− Multi Use Room', '− Public Transportation', '− Security System', '− Smoke Free', '− Cable/Satellite Available', '− Car Wash Area', '− Dog Park Pet Care', '− Online Services', '− Planned Community Activities', '− Sports Courts', '− Sundeck', '− Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', '− Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '− Wireless Internet Available', 'Unit Features', '.....', '− Balcony/Patio', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpeting', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Dishwasher', '− Kitchen', '− Storage Units', '− Stove', '− Tub/Shower', '− Views', '− Dining Room', '− Hardwood Floors', '− Linen Closet', '− Refrigerator/Freezer', '− Trash Compactor', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', '− Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Our Pet Policy', '...', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Leasing Hours', '...', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Call our Office', '... at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a private tour today.', 'Our Location', '.....', '1247 Adcox Road', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30088', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C4E79A769DD945C']
